name: permaweb-llms-builder
description: Interactive tool to select and curate Permaweb documentation into llms.txt format for AI training

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:data && astro build && bun run scripts/post-build.js
scripts.build:vercel: bun run clean && bun run build:data && VERCEL_BUILD=true astro build && bun run scripts/post-build.js
scripts.build:data: bun run src/utils/crawler.js --output public/docs-index.json && mkdir -p src/data && cp public/docs-index.json src/data/index.json
scripts.crawl-and-index: bun run src/utils/crawler.js --output public/docs-index.json && mkdir -p src/data && cp public/docs-index.json src/data/index.json
scripts.validate: bun run test && bun run lint && bun run build
